comment: I took Lifespan Development w/ him. He is awesome. He uses many of his life experiences to relate to his teachings. They helped me retain the information. Test are half multiple choice and other half fill in the blanks.
Dr. Hagebak is awesome. He is a great lecturer and very interested in helping students learn. He gives test reviews that are very thorough.

He is soooo AMAZING!!!!! He has so many interesting stories to contribute to the lectures! He maade class fun and its hard for me to have fun at 9am!!! BEST PROFESSOR AT KSU!! So sad I'm not a Psychology major!

I LOVE Dr. Hagebak! One of the best professors in KSU! He gives you 5 tests, and you can drop one. He assigns a research paper, which is fun (if you choose the right topic). If I could, I would take take him again in another class! I have no complaints against this guy :)

He is one of the best professors I have had at KSU! Attending class is important, but he is flexible. No attendance policy, but his stories are great so you won't want to miss them. Also he was said that he didn't get any peppers for being hot, so if you read this Dr. Hagebak, I was paying attention to you!
Awesome prof. Very straightforward. Interesting life experiences he shares to make material relatable. Very understanding and friendly. Refers to himself as "Papa".

Dr. Hagebak is the greatest professor. I would not have made it through this semester without his help. He is one of the very few that care and want to see his students be successful. Many professors have forgotten what it was like to be a student but not Dr. Hagebak. I would do all of my PSYC classes with him if possible!!!

Prof Hagebak is excellent! His exams are straightforward, his lectures are informative and sprinkled with hilarious personal stories, and the research assignment is actually fun. I highly suggest him!

He lectures, but shows graphs, pics), and statistics that all help.you MUST read textbook. his test are really easy, he gives a review a class before the test.  his tests are short answer and MC. he'll tell u what info you'll need to know.  5 tests, lowest one is dropped, and a research project that you'll really enjoy

Dr. Hagebak is incredible. He actually gets to know his students and tells plenty of stories so you get to know him as well. It's a very easy class. There are 5 tests and 1 paper and your lowest test is dropped. He is a very sweet man with plenty of life experience. I would definitely recommend him and take him again!

Great Professor! Gets to know his students, is really funny and personable.. keeps class interesting by incorporating personal narratives & interesting examples. Prof. Hagebak is 72, so he's got plenty of knowledge and life-experience to draw from. It was a pleasure taking his class. Wonderful Professor!!

His class is sooo easy and interesting as well. I didn't use book and I got a B out of his class. Just show up take notes and do his study guide and you will do just fine.... and also he does a mid term paper and 5 test and drop the lowest test. I would take him again anytime.

By far, one of the BEST professors at Kennesaw!!! He is extremely funny and easy to talk to..He doesn't just stick to a boring lecture but incorporates stories and events in his life that will have you on the floor laughing. His tests are straight from the notes and he gives you a study guide for the test pointing out exactly what to study.

Dr. Hagebak is an awesome professor. He genuinely cares about student success. Tells stories from his own experience to keep you interested. If you ever have the chance to take Dr. Hagebak you definately should. HIGHLY reccomeded.
